page.title: 05Henstead Church 3
page.content: Inside the vestry the robes are kept and there is a safe in which all the registers are kept plus silver and money from collections. There is one bell which due to a weak frame is nly pulled down and not allowed to swing over. It rings 5 minutes before a service is due to begin. Nowadays the church is only full for special services like weddings, funerals and when the Old School attends.During the week services are held at Brampton and Sotterley churches. From 1986 Henstead church and and Hulver Methodist church are to share services.
